name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lolsworth, madnes, littlecat, riotdejaneiro, jdhenry105, mikeronomicon, Thorfinn, sevenarts, aargh, DiamondMonster, KingPete, wittyname, Catachresis, lamelliform, trisha, regrepnsnefpoh, NDCaesar, fancypants, Sweetlips, atticusonline, Art-Vader, mustconcentrate, SoupyTwist, Carrot, pete, retardedgenius, cognitonaut, regrepsnefpoh, gardenhead_, suprememongoose, benfromtenn, littlefatdog, dropkickpikachu, heatbag, holly_golightly, ibetso, Madoushi, stormagnet, sp1derbaby, slalvation, afvbs)

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by littlecat, StoatLad, wildcat, Carpetbag, wittyname, ajg, Connellingus, equinn2006, RedMange, Fcannon, littlefatdog, holly_golightly, Nictusempra)

name: soticoto
text: Besides... it isn't worth bitching about when the lower end is "Meh" and the upper end is Pant-Wettingly Awesome.

name: freakywonton
text: i love your avatar btw

name: mikeronomicon
text: I retract my reprieve on the doom of your genitals.

name: catachresis
text: My Firefox doesn't show the alt-text on this magical thing, but this is one of the few that I remember.

name: epicurus
text: I cannot imagine any child calling their room that. Are kids ever like that? Am I turning into an old man? When I was little, did I only think about writing papers and getting a job where I don't have to expect to step in vomit or get stabbed, like I do now?

name: mira
text:
Before a child hits the age of five, they are filled with a wondrous joy about the world around them.

Except when they're screaming or shitting themselves.

name: epicurus
text: ...and as they grow older, those last two activities take up more and more of their time, first screaming, then in their ripe old age mostly shitting themselves.

name: mattfish
text: Do you feel like you are channelling Shakespeare?

name: epicurus
text: I'm not sure. Did Shakespeare really want a pound of hot wings? Because if so then quite possibly yes.

name: cagliostro
text: That's recently been put forward as an interpretation of Sonnet 118.

name: slalvation
text: It sounds like something an adult would call the child's room, but the child would enjoy the nickname until the child became older and began to found their parent/caretaker's affection "lame".

name: slalvation
text: ugh, find. god damn.

name: hellofyellin
text: The cat's nephew is very vulnerable to fads.

name: julia
text: The lamp makes it

name: littlefatdog
text: that is the funniest 'goth' costume possible. more like the charles-dickens-night-watchman crowd

name: tim_simmons
text: this is the old school goth. they know incantations and stuff.

name: heccibiggs
text: They do magick. With a k .

name: tonyhighwind
text: Is that the u calling the k superfluous?

name: cracklewater
text:
It looks a bit like LN's goth-up is influenced by faux Uncle Culpepper's Southern Ways training.
Mayhap he was disappointed that the lessons ended abruptly with Lie Bot's shooting?

name: tttt
text: best alt. text ever

name: crinklebat
text: Desist, man! C'mon!

name: shoinan
text: I used to have a house on Cuddleplace Lane. I found the atmosphere a little intrusive for my taste.

name: feetnotes
text: I remember wondering how long Little Nephew had lived with Ray (apparently since he was 2, anyway). Maybe Ray's brother/sister is dead. This would explain why no mention of them is ever made.

name: stormagnet
text: Being an orphan would certainly give LN some Dickensian/Goth street cred.

name: ezcmac
text: It's true; the background color is #666666. Coincidence that it is a melancholy (and evil) color.

name: dorothypoopbot
text: I know, I checked too.

name: jesler729
text: To see Ray's face in panel 3 would be to know the meaning of shame

name: merkin579
text: You would have a terrible porn name if you grew up on Cuddleplace Lane.

name: cailetshadow
text: Welcome to the wide world of Bottoming.

name: laserblade
text: Ha ha ha ha ha.  Wide.

name: spinynorman
text: That is a very expressive backside.

name: c_dizzle
text: it's like a matador meet elvis meets paul revere.

name: beansdooma
text: I love how Ray just looks blankly at LN in the last panel.

name: ovenface
text: I think it's freakin adorable that ray and little nephew called ln's room one cuddleplace lane.

name: softerworld
text: Is... Does this mean that LN lives with Ray? Is Ray LN's only Parent ?

name: wigglestick
text: When using websafe colors, the hex code is always three pairs of numbers. This means that the bgcolor of LN's room could be abbreviated to #666.

name: boredom_man
text: If I ever saw a hexadecimal number written as 666, I would secondly assume it meant 060606, not 666666. I would firstly assume there was a Problem, though.

name: killingthejay
text: amici's is good, but patxi's is better.

name: greatwhite
text: I just came in here to say Amici's pizza is the best, greasiest filthy pizza ever. It's not a classy pizza, but god damnit if that don't improve it.

name: xndrew
text: I... I didn't even get to read the strip before I started laughing. Oh god.

name: carlyle
text: Ray's face just experience rigor mortis brought on by shock.

name: tttt2
text: i don't think goths worship the devil necessarily onstad you dipshit

name: tttt2
text: jk maybe they do who gives a shit really
